name: Easy Football
description:
FINALLY! A really fun and easy to play football game for the pc that doesn't require next gen hardware. If you're a football fan then I have just the game for you!

Easy Football features

- simple controls...left click hike and move...right click to throw

- created for low end PC's, runs on any PC with Direct X

- you can run the game in windowed or full screen mode

- runs at a maximum of 60 frames per second, keeps your pc cool, saves energy

- a play for every purpose, 12 offensive plays, 12 defensive

- control the ball speed, throw bullets, or high lofty tosses for max yardage

- offense friendly receivers that do their best to go get that ball

- displays player routes so you know where they are going

- you don't have to throw on routes, in fact, off route throws are critical for getting "open"

- anyone can play this game, kids, adults, doesn't matter, it's very easy
